comments.en:
Multi-function device: Printer, scanner, copier, fax. Standard model and "xi" model have different fax page memory sizes and zoom factor ranges for copying.

To get all functionality of this printer working under Linux, especially also the non-printing features, like scanning, printer status, maintenance, and photo download from memory cards, use the HPLIP driver package from HP.

Copying should work, it does not need the PC.

Consumables/Refills: 2 cartridges (1 black, 1 color)
